Key Match Events: England won 2-1 against Slovakia in a Euro 2024 Round of 16 match
Guehi (3'), Mainoo (7'), Bellingham (17') scored for England
Kucka (13'), Skriniar (45+1'), Pekarik (77'), Vavro (108'), Gyomber (114'), Suslov (120+1') scored for Slovakia
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Gordon believes he would add a 'different element' to England's attack with his direct style
Gordon hopes to give Gareth Southgate a selection headache
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's match against Slovakia was played in extra time
England will face the winner of the match between Spain and Croatia in the next round
Others: Luke Shaw is still recovering from a muscle injury and his involvement in the match against Slovakia is uncertain
